deployProxyAndRefund(address,uint256,uin.details: Creates a new proxy with create 2, initializes the wallet and refunds the relayer (if gas limit is greater than 0).

params.gasLimit: The transaction's gas limit. It needs to be the same as the actual transaction gas limit.
params.maxFeePerGas: Maximum amount that the user is willing to pay for a unit of gas.
params.relayer: Address that forwards the transaction so it abstracts away the gas costs.

preComputeAddress(address,address,bytes,.details: Precomputes the address of a proxy that is created through 'create2'.

proxyCreationCode().details: Allows to retrieve the creation code used for the Proxy deployment. With this it is easily possible to calculate predicted address.

proxyRuntimeCode().details: Allows to retrieve the runtime code of a deployed Proxy. This can be used to check that the expected Proxy was deployed.

devdoc.title: LaserFactory - Factory for creating new Laser proxies and helper methods.

deployProxyAndRefund(address,uint256,uin.notice: If 'gasLimit' does not match the actual gas limit of the transaction, the relayer can incur losses. It is the relayer's responsability to make sure that they are the same, the user does not get affected if a mistake is made. We prefer to prioritize the user's safety (not overpay) over the relayer.
